Method Detail

createProcessInstance

pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.ProcessInstance createProcessInstance(pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.config.ProcessDefinitionConfig config,
                                                                            java.lang.String externalKey,
                                                                            pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.UserData user,
                                                                            java.lang.String description,
                                                                            java.lang.String keyword,
                                                                            java.lang.String source,
                                                                            java.lang.String internalId)
 Method  creates and registers, "a new process instance" on the basis of available config.





Parameters:
config - process definition config, based on which the instance is to be constructed
externalKey - (the field is not required)
user - The creator
description - A description of the instance (the field is not required)
keyword - (the field is not required)
source - Always filled: "portlet"
internalId - Always filled: "portlet" internalID - internal key (if null, it will be generated from config and externalkey, when externalkey is null, it will generate a unique number) (the field is not required)

Returns:
Newly created process instance.

getProcessData

pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.ProcessInstance getProcessData(java.lang.String internalId)
                                                                     throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException
 Returns the process instance, on the basis of internalID. that is given by Aperte and visible to the user in the system such as: "Complaint.740020"
 
 Warning! Method is exclude from WSDL!





Parameters:
internalId - InternalID from pt_process_instance table

Returns:
Process Instance based on internalID

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If internalId is wrong and process Instance, does not exists (including param null or empty values).

isProcessRunning

boolean isProcessRunning(java.lang.String internalId)
                         throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException
 
 The method determines whether a process is in progress. On the basis of the "running" field in "pt_process_instance table".





Parameters:
internalId - InternalID from pt_process_instance table

Returns:
Value of running field.

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If internalId is wrong and process Instance, does not exists (including param null or empty values).

saveProcessInstance

void saveProcessInstance(pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.ProcessInstance processInstance)
  
 Service saves the modified instances, or create new one. But only in the pt_process_instance table!
 
 Warning! Method is exclude from WSDL!





Parameters:
processInstance - Process Instance to save.

assignTaskFromQueue

pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.BpmTask assignTaskFromQueue(pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.nonpersistent.ProcessQueue q,
                                                                  pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.UserData user)
 
 Assigns a task from the queue to the user if he has permission.
 
 Warning! Method is exclude from WSDL!
 
 This method is not working properly because it uses the method of 
 "getUserQueuesFromConfig" that does not return the correct results.





Parameters:
q - Queue
user - User Data

Returns:
BpmTask with new assigned user

getTaskDataForProcessInstance

pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.BpmTask getTaskDataForProcessInstance(java.lang.String taskExecutionId,
                                                                            java.lang.String taskName)
                                                                            throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException,
                                                                                   org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsIllegalArgumentException
 
 Returns TaskBpm data based on Process Instance.





Parameters:
taskExecutionId - The name of the task from table  "jbpm4_task" in eg. "Accept" or "Complaint"
taskName - "execution_id_" from the table "jbpm4_task", the value is the same as internalId the table "pt_process_instance" eg. "Complaint.730231"

Returns:
Bpm task for Process Instance

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If taskExecutionId is wrong and  BpmTask, does not exists (including param null or empty values).

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsIllegalArgumentException - If taskName is null or empty.

adminCancelProcessInstance

void adminCancelProcessInstance(java.lang.String internalId)
                                throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException
 
 The method is used to cancel a process instance, by setting in the table "pt_process_instance" value "false" in the "running" and the value "null" in the column "status". 
 In addition,  the history is updated.





Parameters:
internalId - InternalID from t_process_instance table

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If internalId is wrong and process instance does not exists (including param null or empty values).

startProcessInstance

pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.ProcessInstance startProcessInstance(java.lang.String bpmnkey,
                                                                           java.lang.String userLogin)
                                                                           throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException,
                                                                                  org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsIllegalArgumentException
 
 Service creates and registers, "a new process instance" on the basis of available config, the name can be downloaded by using the method: "getActiveConfigurations ()".





Parameters:
bpmnkey - Name of the process configuration,  eg"Reservation".
userLogin - Login of the user who is to become the creator.

Returns:
New process instance.

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If "userLogin" is wrong and  User does not exists (including param null or empty values).

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsIllegalArgumentException - If "bpmnkey" is null or empty.

java.util.List<pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.BpmTask> findProcessTasks(java.lang.String internalId,
                                                                               java.lang.String userLogin)
                                                                               throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException
 
 Returns the BPMN tasks for the process, if the user is given, it returns only TASKI assigned that user, otherwise it returns all TASKI for this instance.

userLogin - user login

Returns:
List of BpmTask

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If userLogin,internalId is wrong and  User or process instance does not exists (including param null or empty values).

performAction

void performAction(java.lang.String internalId,
                   java.lang.String actionName,
                   java.lang.String bpmTaskName,
                   java.lang.String userLogin)
                   throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException
 
 The method of "pushing" the process further, the fields:  "actionName" and "bpmTaskName" 
 are not required they can be null or empty. In this case, 
 if there is more than one action ore task, its taken randomly one of resulted list. 
 Action is a transition, so when XOR appears there are 2 possible actions.
 
 If userLogin is null adminCompleteTask(ProcessInstance processData,
 ProcessStateAction action, BpmTask bpmTask) is called.





Parameters:
internalId - InternalID from t_process_instance table
actionName - the name of the action to execute (field is not required)
bpmTaskName - Taska name. (field is not required)
userLogin - user login (field is not required)

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If userLogin,internalId is wrong and  User or process instance does not exists (including param null or empty values).

findUserTasksPaging

java.util.List<pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.BpmTask> findUserTasksPaging(java.lang.Integer offset,
                                                                                  java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                  java.lang.String userLogin)
                                                                                  throws org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException
 
 Returns a list of BPMN tasks for the user, the list may be limited: a max number and the first element position.





Parameters:
offset - The offset in the results list. Default 0(field is not required)
limit - The number of results to be displayed Default 1000 (field is not required)
userLogin - user login

Returns:
List of Bpm Tasks

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException - If userLogin is wrong and  User does not exists (including param null or empty values).

Throws:

org.aperteworkflow.service.fault.AperteWsWrongArgumentException -

adminCompleteTask

void adminCompleteTask(pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.ProcessInstance processData,
                       pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.config.ProcessStateAction action,
                       pl.net.bluesoft.rnd.processtool.model.BpmTask bpmTask)
 
 
 Same as perform action but its not testing if User has permissions. So its possible to complete every task.
 
 Warning! Method is exclude from WSDL!





Parameters:
processData - Process Instance to work on.
action - One of many possible actions to perform.
bpmTask - BpmTask to be "pushed".
See Also:
performAction(String, String, String, String)
